00042 class Etinker : public QMCalculator
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     Etinker() {};
00046     ~Etinker() {};
00047 
00048 //    const char *Description() { return "Tinker input: xyz coordinates [Angstroem] with a given molecule centered in the box."; }
00049 
00050     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00051     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00052     void WriteAtoms(Topology *atop, Molecule *mol);
00053    
00054 private:
00055     double _dump_cutoff;
00056     Property * _options;
00057     bool _order; //if false then then first mol in the xyz file is the charged molecule
00058                      //if true then the ordering of the molecules stays the same
00059 };
00060 
00061 inline void Etinker::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options) {
00062     _options = options;
00063     if (options->exists("options.etinker.cutoff")) {
00064         _dump_cutoff = options->get("options.etinker.cutoff").as<double>();
00065         cout << "Writing out atomic XYZ coordinates for molecular cutoff: " << _dump_cutoff <<" nm"<<endl;
00066     } else {
00067         _dump_cutoff=50.0;
00068         cout << "Warning: No cutoff for molecules has been provided, using default cutoff of 50nm" << endl;
00069 }
00070 
00071     if (options->exists("options.etinker.order")) {
00072     if (options->get("options.etinker.order").as<string > () == "top") {
00073         _order = false;
00074         cout << "Producing xyz file in Angstroem and placing the charged molecule on top of this file and its coordinates at center of the box"<<endl;
00075     }
00076     else if  (options->get("options.etinker.order").as<string > () == "keep") {
00077         _order = true;
00078         cout << "Producing xyz file in Angstroem and keeping order of molecules while putting the charged molecule in center of the box"<<endl;
00079             }
00080 }
00081     else throw std::runtime_error("Error in tinker: specify if you want to keep the order of the molecules (keep) or if the charged molecule should be on top of the file (top).");
00082 }
00083 
00084 inline bool Etinker::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top) {
00085     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00086     Topology atop;
00087     atop.setBox(top->getBox());
00088     for (vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl = lcharges.begin(); itl != lcharges.end(); itl++) {
00089         top->AddAtomisticBeads(*itl, &atop);
00090     }
00091     cout << "Number of charge units in top " << lcharges.size() << endl;
00092     cout << "Number of molecules in atop " << atop.MoleculeCount() << endl;
00093     double crged, neutr;
00094 
00095     MoleculeContainer::iterator imol;
00096     for (imol = atop.Molecules().begin(); imol != atop.Molecules().end(); imol++) {
00097         Molecule *mol = *imol;
00098         CrgUnit *crg = mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ();
00099         WriteAtoms(&atop, mol);
00100         cout << "writing out coordinats in Angstroem for crgunit " << crg->getId()<<"\n";
00101     }
00102     return true;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 inline void Etinker::WriteAtoms(Topology *atop, Molecule *mol) //wegen Übergabe per * unten ->
00107 {
00108     MoleculeContainer::iterator cmol;
00109     int nr = mol->getId()+1;
00110             string filename = "xyz_" + boost::lexical_cast<string > (nr);
00111             FILE * data;
00112             int countmol=0;
00113             if (_order) {//keep the order of the molecules
00114                  data=fopen(filename.c_str(),"w");
00115          MoleculeContainer::iterator dmol;
00116          for (dmol = atop->Molecules().begin(); dmol != atop->Molecules().end(); dmol++) {
00117         //   if (*dmol == mol) continue;
00118         //We should replace getUserData by a funtion GetCom for molecules
00119         vec bcs = atop->BCShortestConnection(mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom(), (*dmol)->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom());
00120          if ( abs(bcs)> _dump_cutoff) continue;
00121         countmol=countmol+1;
00122         vec dist = (*dmol)->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom() - mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom();
00123         vec diff = bcs - dist;
00124         for (int j = 0; j != (*dmol)->BeadCount(); j++) {
00125                 Bead *bj = (*dmol)->getBead(j);
00126                 //distance vector may have to be shifted by s
00127                 vec r_v = mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom()-(bj->getPos() + diff);
00128                 string ss = (*dmol) ->getName();
00129                                // data << mol->getId()<<" "<<(*dmol)->getId()<<" "<< r_v.getX()*10.0 <<" "<< r_v.getY()*10.0 <<" "<< r_v.getZ()*10.0 <<"\n";
00130                  fprintf(data, "%s %d %d %.6f %.6f %.6f\n",ss.c_str(),mol->getId()+1,(*dmol)->getId()+1,r_v.getX()*10.0,r_v.getY()*10.0,r_v.getZ()*10.0);
00131         }
00132 
00133     }
00134 
00135             }
00136             else{
00137             //First write out the xyz coordinates of atoms belonging to molecule N which is in the center of the box in file xyz_N
00138             data=fopen(filename.c_str(),"w");
00139              countmol=countmol+1;
00140             for (int j = 0; j != mol->BeadCount(); j++) {
00141                 Bead *bj = mol->getBead(j);
00142                 vec r_v = mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom()-(bj->getPos());
00143                 string ss = mol ->getName();
00144                 fprintf(data, "%s %d %d %.6f %.6f %.6f\n",ss.c_str(),mol->getId()+1,mol->getId()+1,r_v.getX()*10.0,r_v.getY()*10.0,r_v.getZ()*10.0);
00145         }
00146      MoleculeContainer::iterator dmol;
00147          for (dmol = atop->Molecules().begin(); dmol != atop->Molecules().end(); dmol++) {
00148            if (*dmol == mol) continue;
00149         //We should replace getUserData by a funtion GetCom for molecules
00150         vec bcs = atop->BCShortestConnection(mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom(), (*dmol)->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom());
00151          if ( abs(bcs)> _dump_cutoff) continue;
00152         countmol=countmol+1;
00153         vec dist = (*dmol)->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom() - mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom();
00154         vec diff = bcs - dist;
00155         for (int j = 0; j != (*dmol)->BeadCount(); j++) {
00156                 Bead *bj = (*dmol)->getBead(j);
00157                 //distance vector may have to be shifted by s
00158                 vec r_v = mol->getUserData<CrgUnit > ()->GetCom()-(bj->getPos() + diff);
00159                 string ss = (*dmol) ->getName();
00160                 // data << mol->getId()<<" "<<(*dmol)->getId()<<" "<< r_v.getX()*10.0 <<" "<< r_v.getY()*10.0 <<" "<< r_v.getZ()*10.0 <<"\n";
00161                  fprintf(data, "%s %d %d %.6f %.6f %.6f\n",ss.c_str(),mol->getId()+1,(*dmol)->getId()+1,r_v.getX()*10.0,r_v.getY()*10.0,r_v.getZ()*10.0);
00162         }
00163         
00164     }
00165             }
00166             fprintf(data, "%d\n",countmol);
00167     fclose(data);
00168     //data.close();
00169 }
